channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Scion of hospitality conglomerate Genting Group sees potential in wellness-based co-living spaces

item.title: As Trump and RFK Jr. Reach Into Parents’ Lives, Can Democrats Capitalize?
item.description: As prices of baby gear surge and vaccine misinformation spreads, some Democrats see a chance to tap into parents’ raw emotions — something Republicans...

item.title: Gen Z’s not drowning in buy-now-pay-later debt—yet. But experts warn it’s a luxury lifestyle trap

item.title: China’s unemployed Gen Z are proudly calling themselves ‘rat people’ in a rebellion against burnout
item.description: Instead of even trying to chase jobs that seem out of reach, many Gen Zers are embracing living like a rat—not showering or leaving their dwelling for...

item.title: The Mother Whose Catholic Faith Inspired the Future Pope
item.description: Mildred Prevost, a mother of three who sought a graduate degree, held her religious devotion at the center of her life.

item.title: Abel Tesfaye Bids Farewell to The Weeknd in ‘Hurry Up Tomorrow’ Film
item.description: In his new film, “Hurry Up Tomorrow,” the Weeknd plays the Weeknd for the last time. What’s next for him?

item.title: For exhausted stock market pros, the choice is buy or stay home
item.description: A pile of cash on the sidelines keeps growing in the face of a resilient S&P 500 Index, which has soared 14% in a month since bottoming on April 8.

item.title: Iran-U.S. Nuclear Talks Resume: What’s at Stake?
item.description: A new round of talks began Sunday in Oman on the future of Iran’s nuclear program.

item.title: Zelensky Demands Cease-Fire in Response to Putin’s Call for Direct Talks
item.description: Ukraine’s leader is pushing for an immediate truce as European leaders say they would impose new sanctions on Moscow if the Russian president refused.

item.title: John Cameron Mitchell Teaches Young People to Be Punk
item.description: I toured college campuses and found a generation yearning to learn about punk as a survival strategy.

item.title: US-China tariff talks to continue Sunday as Trump touts ‘great progress made’ on first day
item.description: "Many things discussed, much agreed to. A total reset negotiated in a friendly, but constructive, manner,” Trump wrote on his Truth Social platform.
